short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bruxt.com: Find B2B Company Info for Free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bruxt Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing comprehensive information about any company's website that you visit. Whether you're a researcher, job seeker, investor, or simply curious about a company, this extension brings valuable insights right to your fingertips.

Key Features:

Company Overview: Instantly access a concise overview of the company, including its mission, industry, size, and location, without leaving the webpage.

Social Media Presence: Explore the company's social media profiles directly from the extension to see how active they are and what they're sharing with their audience.

How it Works:
Simply install the Bruxt Chrome Extension from the Chrome Web Store and let it seamlessly integrate into your browsing experience. Once installed, the extension automatically detects company websites you visit and provides relevant information in a user-friendly interface, accessible with just a click.

Empower yourself with valuable insights into companies with the Bruxt Chrome Extension. Whether you're researching potential employers, analyzing competitors, or staying informed about industry trends, this extension is your ultimate companion for gathering actionable information effortlessly.

For more info:
Email: support@bruxt.com
Website: https://www.bruxt.com
Privacy Policy: https://www.bruxt.com/privacy-policy/
